column5: I heard the ice is out on Eagle Lake. At least the northern part of the lake, Myers Bay & Vermillion Bay.

You are correct Narda.......Vermilion Bay ice out occurred on May 3rd. ......and what is your favourite Canadian Rye? .......my favourite rye drink......rye, diet ginger ale, and a hefty squeeze of fresh lemon wedge....over ice. As I look out at an ice free Vermilion Bay, my only thought is that the lake trout are biting...!www.electricbeaver.ca
That would be "Special Old" Ernie got us started on it 22 years ago. Special Old with water and a wedge of lime is the official drink of NARDA. Cheers!!!!!!
Gord drinks anything that is wet!!! Go get them Lake Trout Gord
Sounds like my kind of drinking buddy!!! We'll find out in September.
Good Luck Narda maybe you can get him to buy one once!!!
